name: Maiming
description:
Crit +20 if target foe's HP < 100%. If target foe is defeated, target foe is also stabilized but is inflicted with a lasting injury. Target foe's controller may choose the injury by rolling 1d6 and using the following table, or may substitute an injury of their own choice:
   1. Loss of a limb.
  2. Loss of an eye.
  3. Scarring of the torso.
  4. Scarring of the face.
  5. Blood clots slowly.
  6. Emotional trauma only.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
